content: i think the easiest way to dress up a basic crochet hat is to use an interesting colorway i have more than a few multi-colored skeins in my stash and decided to try some bernat mosaic for this pattern it has long lengths of each color which creates the beautiful striping from black to magenta to a light pink blush these are my sister s favorite colors so i m sure she ll be calling dibs on this one skill level easy sizes newborn 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months toddler child teen/small adult medium adult & large adult supplies - worsted weight yarn i used less than one of skein of bernat mosaic in pink poodle for the medium adult size - 5 0 mm h-8 crochet hook or size needed to obtain the gauge - yarn needle for weaving in ends follow me on facebook 1 for more free patterns like this one please feel free to sell finished items from my patterns pattern credit is not required but is always welcomed copyright © 2014 by craft chic all rights reserved no part of this publication may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means including photocopying recording or other electronic or mechanical methods without the prior written permission of the publisher 1 https //www facebook com/craftchicblog
